name: Guacamole
subtitle: A pharmacist training application
description: This project is a progressive web application developed with 2 teammates for the third year annual project. It allows student pharmacists to train and challenge themselves on quizzes on molecules and their properties. this project started in september is still ongoing and will end in march 2021.

name: EasyLatex
subtitle: An intuitive Latex editor
description: With this personal project, I wanted to develop useful tools. This website allow to create LaTex documents from easy markup language.

name: Velocity
subtitle: A self-service bicycle system
description: This java application is a self-service bicycle system. Several famous design patterns are used in this project. This program is fully tested.

name: Automaton
subtitle: Automaton manipulation library
description: This C++ library provides an interface for creating, manipulating and using automatons. This program is fully tested by unit tests with the GoogleTest library.

name: SurfClean
subtitle: A web application for surfers
description: Developed with 7 teammates during the "Nuit de L'Info", this site allows surfers to come together around their passion. Rewarded by 2 prices üèÖ
